g.H1984: to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make ashow, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causat...
g.H853: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
g.H3068: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
g.H3605: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
g.H1471: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts
g.H7623: properly, to address in aloud tone, i.e. (specifically) loud; figuratively, to pacify (as if by words)
g.H523: a collection, i.e. community of persons

g.H3588: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
g.H1396: to be strong; by implication, to prevail, act insolently
g.H2617: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
g.H5921: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
g.H3068: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
g.H5769: properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbia...
